Hi Elena, this is Agent_Nina. I’ll check the customs declaration details for you.

messages.content: My package hasn’t moved in two days. I need it urgently—what’s causing the delay?

messages.content: My app freezes whenever I tap 'Submit Feedback' after browsing the FAQs.
Hi Mel, this is Agent Sophia. Does the freeze happen only after navigating multiple FAQ pages?
Yes, usually after jumping through 3–4 FAQ screens and then tapping submit.
Thanks, that helps. Could you share a quick screen recording of what you see when it freezes so I can pinpoint the trigger?
Sure, just uploaded the recording.
Got it, reviewing now.

Thanks for the recording — I noticed the freeze happens after switching between FAQ pages without closing the keyboard before tapping 'Submit'. The keyboard stays active underneath and blocks the input state, which triggers the freeze.
For now, closing the keyboard before tapping 'Submit Feedback' prevents the freeze. Can you try dismissing the keyboard after your last FAQ view and then tapping submit?
Just tried that — it worked! No freeze this time.

Great! Glad that helped. I’ll forward this case internally so the team improves how the app dismisses the keyboard when navigating FAQ pages, but you shouldn’t face the freeze again with that workaround.

troubleshooting_attempted: closing keyboard before tapping Submit Feedback

target.intent: ui_event_state_conflict_analysis
